TopicTitle: KSP Randomly Crashes - No Apparent Errors?

Articles.Content:
KSP is randomly crashing at random times for no visible reason. I can be attaching something, or adding a part, and \*poof\* the game just closes itself and I'm greeted with my desktop. I did not have this issue in 1.0.0 (I skipped .0.1-.0.3 because they were an unbalanced buggy mess).
